about_the_game:
Show them your resolve by fighting tooth and nail with the Bear Claw Weapon Skin Set. These skins can be equipped in the Loadout menu on both Security and Insurgent teams for the following weapons where available:

• Desert Eagle
• AKM (Rifleman)
• SKS (Advisor)
• Sterling (Breacher)
• TOZ-194 (Breacher)
• Mosin-Nagant (Marksman)

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase. They can be equipped in-game in the Loadout menu under each weapon’s “Aesthetic” upgrade category.
